component.description: AccordionPanel is a container component that displays content in stacked format.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.

attribute.name: widgetVar
attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.

attribute.name: activeIndex
attribute.description: Index of the active tab or a comma separated string of indexes when multiple mode is on. Default is zero.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Inline style of the container element.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the container element.

attribute.name: onTabChange
attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a tab is clicked.

attribute.name: onTabShow
attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a tab is shown.

attribute.name: cache
attribute.description: Defines if activating a dynamic tab should load the contents from server again.

attribute.name: var
attribute.description: Name of collection iterator to use in dynamic number of tabs.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: List to iterate to display dynamic number of tabs.

attribute.name: multiple
attribute.description: Enables activating multiple tabs, default is false.

attribute.name: dir
attribute.description: Defines text direction, valid values are "ltr" (default) and "rtl".

attribute.name: prependId
attribute.description: AccordionPanel is a naming container thus prepends its id to its children by default, a false value turns this behavior off except for dynamic tabs.
